pages.text: Unlike other modifications that have tools, you HAVE to use the $(l:pedestals:tools/toolswapper)Tool Swapper$() in the offhand to extract Tools from the pedestal.

pages.title: Tools (Inserting)
pages.text: When inserting tools, they will be placed in an invisibe slot, and do not display anything on the pedestal. $(br) Inserting Tools can be done with the tool in the Offhand, then Right Click the pedestal, this will remove one tool from your Offhand, placing it in the pedestal.

pages.title: Tools (Extracting)
pages.text: When extracting tools, use the $(l:pedestals:tools/toolswapper)Tool Swapper$() in the Offhand, then Left Click. This will remove the currently inserted Tool from the pedestal.

pages.title: Tool (Pedestal Info)
pages.text: When right clicking the $(l:pedestals:tools/toolswapper)Tool Swapper$() on the pedestal, your chat will display some info about the currently insert tool.
